entry.title: joelastpass closed issue 169 on facebook/hiphop-php
entry.content: __FILE__ is always relative to the current working directory in hiphop, and can't be used for in require/include

entry.title: scottmac pushed to master at facebook/hiphop-php
entry.content:
• mwilliams committed 8741a61
    Fix an uninitialized field

    Summary:
    m_containsBareThis was not initialized. Also add a couple of useful accessors.

    Test Plan:
    fast_tests slow_tests

    Reviewed By: qigao
    Reviewers: qigao, myang
    CC: ps, qigao
    Revert Plan:

    Differential Revision: 239934
  • mwilliams committed fe9efee
    [Fix] Fix uses of $this in pseudomain

    Summary:
    If a file is required from within a method, the file's pseudomain should be
    able to access the method's $this (and should behave as if it were part of the
    method). This didnt work.

    Task ID: #

    Test Plan:
    fast_tests slow_tests

    Reviewed By: qigao
    Reviewers: qigao, myang, macvicar
    CC: ps, mwilliams, qigao
    Differential Revision: 239721
  • asharma committed cfdfbf8
    Fix gcc-4.6 related warnings

    Summary:
    Code cleanup. Mostly kill unused variables.

    Task ID: #542673

    Test Plan:
    make fast_tests

    540/540 unit tests passed.
    4/1508 unit tests skipped.
    1504/1508 unit tests passed.
    1619/1619 unit tests passed.

    Reviewed By: mwilliams
    Reviewers: mwilliams, macvicar
    CC: hphp-eng@lists, hphp-diffs@lists, mpal, ps, mwilliams
    Revert Plan:
    OK

    Tags:

    - begin *PUBLIC* platform impact section -
    Bugzilla: #
    - end platform impact -

    Differential Revision: 239426
  • 9 more commits »
